name: Cohen Palmer
text: Usually fast and easy.

name: Ann Legg
text:
Your people were very helpful.
They even used the fork lift to get more product down for us.

name: Steve Russell
text: The crew here goes out of their way to help me and my business.

name: rod rosser
text: Sam helps everyone. Great employee. Deresa ( misspelled maybe) is also a great Smiling helper.

name: David Cunningham
text: They quickly located the tool I needed online and guided me right to it. Thank you.

name: Joseph Woodham
text: A good visit,  employees very helpful with selection of product.

name: Bill Tiemann
text: The pro desk was very helpful in locating product and very friendly.

name: Laroy Kirkland
text: Great people......cece is fantastic service pro

name: Alden Harrison
text: Very friendly and helpful

name: David Pham
text: The price is extremely good here and the helpers are great.  The price is softer than homedepot and low.  I will come back

resp.text: Thank you, David. The lumber market is challenging right now. We do our best to keep our prices competitive, our product in stock and our service levels high. Thank you for your kind words. We appreciate your review and your business.

name: William Bowden Jr
text: Always a wonderful experience with this Company. Lowest prices, always stocked, great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review. It's definitely been a challenging year for lumberyards (and our customers)! We appreciate your kind words and your business. Please let us know if there's anything we can do to service you even better.

name: Wood Kirk Works
text: Even though the staff seemed knowledgeable about the products offered here, the vibe of this business is pretentious to say the least. I came in with my girlfriend and her son. We came within 6 ft of several middle-aged employees and weren't greeted once. I had to approach the counter and ask for what I needed (which they didn't have) then I was left to my own devices finding anything else useful in the store. This could have been tolerable if it weren't for the same employees greeting other customers with warm, inviting hellos and good wishes.

resp.text: We apologize that you did not feel seen and appreciated in our store. We pride ourselves on customer service, whether its to contractors who come in every day or first time shoppers. We are fully open to the public and value our customers equally. We failed to demonstrate that. We hope you'll give us another opportunity to earn your business.

name: Jabaria Dent
text: Good customer service. And their wood prices beat Lowe's

resp.text: Thank you for this review. We hope this helps new customers know that, while we are not a global corporation like Lowe's, our prices are  very often lower than the big box stores.

name: A T
text: I ordered fence pickets from them, paid over phone, and had delivered a week later no problem. I call back a few days later to ask if I can get a few more and am told they haven't had any in weeks and I must be confused about who I got them from. I call back the next day and am told there's 30 left but they don't take payments over the phone. It sounds to me like the employees each have their own rules they go by 🙄

resp.text: Hi. We apologize for our poor communication. We should have done a better job explaining the fence board situation. The market for fence boards is extremely turbulent right now. We are accustomed to having a ready supply in stock and ordinarily we would be happy to take an order over the phone and hold the inventory. However, because fence boards are in such high demand and we haven't been able to source them with the dependability of the pre-COVID days, we are discouraging our staff from reserving them, because the last thing we want is a customer to pay for a product, expect it, and we not have it in stock when they are ready for delivery.

name: Andrew O'Dell
text: Good lumber at a good price, knowledgeable and very helpful staff.

name: Manuela Smith
text: Was disappointed by employees knowledge and selling me the wrong tool to fit the screws I bought there.

resp.text: Hi Manuela. We remember you coming in yesterday. We apologize for disappointing you. It's often difficult to discern the size of a screw or bolt from a cell phone image. We suggested a product that would work on a range of bolt sizes, but unfortunately we didn't guess right. Thank you for your business and again we are sorry we weren't able to help you select the right product the first time.

name: Ray Keene
text: Great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Mr. Keene. We appreciate your business.

name: Priscilla Young
text: Friendly environment, eager to assist, fast service.

name: Michelle Morgan
text:
We have been remodeling our home and I have been looking for a front door for about 2 months now with no luck and very little enthusiasm to sell me a door.  I happen to stumble across Mobile Lumber and Yvette was a breath of fresh air when it came to picking out the perfect front door.  She was very knowledgeable, nice, fast and her follow through was great.  Within 24 hours she had my pricing and order placed for me, even saved me a trip back to West Mobile by handling everything over the phone.  Excellent customer service, I only wish we would had checked Mobile Lumber out at the beginning of our remodel adventure.

Thanks so much Yvette,

Michelle Morgan

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to give us this review. We appreciate it and so does Yvette. If there's anything else we can help you with in the future, please let us know.

name: Heather w
text: Went there a couple of Saturdays ago to look at front doors. Complete waste of time. We were not greeted when walking in, no one came over to assist us, or acknowledged us when we left. Not much selection out on the floor for what we were looking for and no customer service was offered.

resp.text: Hi Heather. We pride ourselves on our customer service, which is one factor that differentiates us from the big box stores. We failed to provide that experience to you and we apologize. Our team is very knowledgeable in exterior door options and we regret that we aren't able to help you select the perfect door for your home. We appreciate you coming in and hope you'll give us another chance.

name: 2SSRS 5th Gen
text: Prices are kinda high. But they also aren't MASKHOLES.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We agree, lumber prices are on the high side right now, but that's across the industry. Lumber is a commodity and prices fluctuate daily (sometimes hourly) depending on the market. We value our reputation for pricing our building materials extremely competitively. It's part of what has kept us around since 1975.

name: OBrien Holcombe
text: This place has been here for decades and at least 4 of those decades I have used them for many project needs. Good folks, wonderful environment and the men in the yard do not get enough praise. So here is to you gentlemen for doing such an outstanding job day in and day out.

resp.text: Brien, we certainly appreciate your support and patronage over the past 4 decades! We will pass this praise along to our guys in the yard. If we can do anything to make your experience even better, please don't hesitate to let us know.

name: Josh Lee
text: Friendly and speedy

name: N Vasko
text: Watch out, they do not always accept returns on some items and they will not give you a heads up

name: Stephen Williams
text: Great for any project.  Excellent contractor services as well.  Can usually fill a large order in a small amount of time.  Quality products, friendly staff and competitive pricing.  Delivery available.

name: Bernard Jackson Jr
text: Always prompt service at Mobile Lumber .

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. Some days are busier than others, but we understand the value of our customers' time and try to get you what you need efficiently so you can keep your jobs moving.

name: Conner Jung
text: My preferred place to buy my lumber and materials. The workers here can break down piece by piece on what you will need for anything you are building. The workers here go above and beyond for first time builders and professional builders. Would go here over Lowes or Home Depot in a heartbeat!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Conner. We appreciate you and your business!

name: Conner Jung
text: My preferred place to buy my lumber and materials. The workers here can break down piece by piece on what you will need for anything you are building. The workers here go above and beyond for first time builders and professional builders. Would go here over Lowes or Home Depot in a heartbeat!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Conner. We appreciate you and your business!

name: Mike Price
text: This is the best hardware store in Mobile.  Much more a home town store.  They treat you like a person not a number.

resp.text: Mike, thank you for the kind words and for your patronage. We appreciate you!

name: Lee Roberts
text: Love mobile always have what i need at a great price. And awesome service been using them since it was staceys hardware.

resp.text: Lee, we appreciate your patronage and support after all these years!  Customers like you are the reason we've been able to to stick around and serve our community for 40+ years.

name: Sara Brunson
text: ML is a great place for all your building needs. The staff is Amazing.

resp.text: Thank you, Sara. We agree! ;)

name: Alvin Nelson
text: Local business ready to help.  They are busy so give yourself some time.

resp.text: Your review put a smile on our faces today! You're right-- we do get busy when the weather gets as pretty as it's been this week, but we do our best to get our customers in and out as quickly as we can. Thank you for your kind words and patience.

name: Ronnie Cliburn
text: The folks there are really friendly and helpful. They don't have the amount of different stuff the Lowe's and home Depot have, but I would rather go there and check first for what I need.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Ronnie. Let us know what you're looking for and we'll always be happy to help you find it, even if it's through another vendor, or we can often order it from our warehouse. See you soon!

name: Detroit Q
text: Some of the worst customer service I have ever experienced. I had never been to this place so I was unsure if customers were allowed to walk through the warehouse. Naturally I ask the clerk at the desk or at least tried to ask and when I say this guy gave the impression that he us too busy to deal with me. The guy wouldn't even stop typing or even give me the common decency of looking at me when he responded. At first I was thinking maybe I was asking to much due to me being a vet and being so use to people at least looking at you to acknowledge your existence but when he proceeded to continue typing and responding with very short answers I knew then it wasn't me. Everyone is entitled to a bad day and I get that but you work in the customer service industry for God sakes. A little hospitality would go a long way. I guess it's on to the next lumber yard.

name: Paul Miller
text: I shopped around and ended up doing my business here.  Well priced and very helpful

name: Eric Linsley
text: Great service. Best trim moulding prices in town!

name: Mark James
text: Good place to get all your buildings needs

name: Katherine Winslow Austill
text:
The items I purchased were not available & what was available was not 1st quality.

None of the items offered for pick-up were straight & defect free.

I had to be very firm in my demand for a full refund.

The experience took over 1.5 hours to:
1) place the order
2) have the order hand written
3) pay for the order
4) drive around to pick up the order
5) walk inside and inform of the poor quality and insufficient quantity
6) walk back out to pick up to show inside sales the poor quality and insufficient quantity
7) walk back inside to ask - then demand a refund
8) wait while the entire order was again hand written and wait for my refund

A complete waste of time.
1.5 hours to accomplish nothing.

resp.text: Hi Katherine. We hate hearing that you had such a bad experience at our store! We are trying to track down your transaction to figure out what happened so it won't happen in the future. Providing an excellent customer service experience is very important to us! Would you be willing to talk to our store manager Lee to help us understand what happened? You can reach him at 661-8000. Again, we are sorry for any inconvenience we caused you.

name: Denise Keaton
text: Don't go anywhere else to pay high dollar for bad wood.  Come to Mobile Lumber and get the good stuff from people who care.

name: Sam Walters
text: Great prices, nice people that work there.

name: Mark Byrd
text: Lennor is great to work with in Commercial Sales

resp.text: We think so too! Thank you for your review and your business, Mark!

name: Ronnie Wilson
text: OUTRAGOUS PRICING ON A PLAIN OLE #2 10' 1X4' PINE 2.50SOMETHING EACH ARE YOU KIDDING?? REDICULOUS

resp.text: Hi Ronnie. We pride ourselves on offering competitive pricing on our building materials. We'll be happy to match our competitors' pricing on this item if you find it for lower.

name: mike piliponis
text: Better quality than Lowes

name: James Callaway
text: Very helpful great staff !!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review. We appreciate your support!

name: Kel Moy
text: Some deals here

name: Johan Arcenal
text: Cheap

name: Vanessa
text: This company has a track record for never having the right lumber delivered at the right time. Time = money. As I'm watching the framing company wait for Mobile Lumber to bring the materials to Dauphin Island as I type this, I'm wondering why it's Tuesday and they've wasted all our time. You should fire your lumber salesman...

name: William J Fulford
text: They getting better

resp.text: Thank you for noticing!  We've implemented some new practices in our yard to increase efficiencies for our customers. Our goal is to be always improving.
